snippet: Mayor Ernest D. Davis, 76, a Democrat, faces a maximum of two years in prison on two counts of federal tax evasion.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Ernest D. Davis, 76, a Democrat, faces a maximum of two years in prison on two counts of federal tax evasion.

headline.main: Mount Vernon, N.Y., Mayor Pleads Guilty to Federal Tax Charges
headline.print_headline: Mount Vernon, N.Y., Mayor Pleads Guilty to Federal Tax Charges
